pages.text: With the ever-present threats looming in the wilderness, advanced weaponry will give you the leg up you need. The $(thing)Purple Steel Rifle$() is a powerful ranged weapon that consumes $(thing)Rifle Ammo$().
With higher range, accuracy, and damage, the rifle far outperforms the bow and crossbow.
$(thing)Bullets$() are made from steel on the anvil. Missed shots can be collected to salvage the bullets.
$(thing)Rifle Ammo$() uses gunpowder to propel the projectile, making it an expensive, but efficient, method of dealing damage.
